titles: The parable of the tares expounded & applyed, in ten sermons preached before his late Majesty King Charles the second monarch of Great Britain. / By Peter Heylin, D.D. To which are added three other sermons of the same author.
author: Heylyn, Peter, 1600-1662.
publisher: printed by J.G. for Humphrey Moseley, at the Princes Arms in St. Pauls Church-yard,
notes: With 3 final leaves of 'To the Reader'.
Variant has "for Humphrey Moseley, at the Prince's Armes" in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
